resources.string:
Raj Kukadia 
 kukadia.r@husky.neu.edu 
 1st year M.S 
 Telecommunication Systems Management

Things that I did not create from the scratch:

 
 > Game UI code and logic behind the level-list that I did not know before this was taken from the Hello Android Text and the code from the Ultimate Tic Tac Toe game. 

 > I did not create the code for managing Handlers, reference: http://androidtrainningcenter.blogspot.com/2013/12/handler-vs-timer-fixed-period-execution.html 

 > Text animation reference, http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34089093/how-to-add-animation-to-a-text-view-in-android 

 > Resizing .png images to hdpi, xxhdpi, xhdpi, ldpi, xxxhdpi, mdpi : https://www.img-bak.in/DQOzACpDQmzxV3IcE3QHQoXoInGgRyZU/

The task is to make 9 different words..


Choose any one letter from the 9 boards..

Great !

 Minimum length of a word should be 3 letters..

 Now choose more two letters to form a word..

 You can't choose from the pink tiles..they are freezed ! 

 Choose letters that are connected diagonally, vertically or horizontally only !
Press this button to confirm your word..\n\n

Good ! 


Other tiles are unlocked for you ! 


Go ahead and make one more word and you are good to play the game !

\ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.
\ This is a word game. You have to make as many words as you can.\n There are two phases in this game.\n Using for this game for the first time ? Touch "How to play"

I have mapped every character to 5 bits. Hence compressing from 16 bits Unicode to 5 bits. 

 Used the same binary values for comparing while the look up is in process. I have put four 3 letter words in a single Long, three 4 letter words in a Long, two 5 letter words in a Long, two 6 letter words in a Long. 

I have put each word from 7 to 25 letters length in a single Long. 

For the words greater than 25 letters, I have used loaded them in string format itself since there are only 23 such words in the dictionary. 

Finally, I have loaded all these encoded files in seperate HashMaps. 

I have loaded the dictionary in the Main Activity itself so that the app runs smoother from there on.

string.name: ack_details_label_two
string.p:
Code for TicTacToe: Hello, Android text by Ed Burnette 
 
 Code for requesting run time permission: https://developer.android.com/training/permissions/requesting.html 
 
 App icon: Google Images 
 
 Sound: http://www.tannerhelland.com/music-directory/ 

 Special thanks to my friend Dharak Savalia who helped me coming with a better idea for loading the dictionary efficiently.

resources.string: The Log Token button logs the Registration token to the log. The Send Notification Button sends the notification to the client device.

Firebase demo code helped in understanding the working of firebase server and how to create a firebase database. 
 Google sign in: https://developers.google.com/identity/sign-in/android/sign-in
